system.description: Also at 14th level, while you are under the effects of Carried Aloft and at least 50 feet off the ground, you may expend 2 uses of Wild Shape to surround yourself with a terrifying whirlwind made of razor-sharp shards. You are surrounded by simultaneous @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.u8e2yij8vcq0puxl]{Blade Barrier} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.n7v09ab1hwk8cupe]{Wind Wall} effects, each extending 5 feet out from your space. You must concentrate to maintain this effect (as per a spell), and it lasts for up to 10 minutes.
